pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with Prime Minister Erna Solberg of the Kingdom of Norway | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
The Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, met today with the Prime Minister of the Kingdom of Norway, Erna Solberg, on the margins of the Global Citizen Concert in Hamburg, Germany.

The leaders reaffirmed the strong bilateral relations that exist between their countries and discussed enhancing cooperation.  

The leaders also reiterated their commitment to combating climate change, including through the implementation of the Paris Agreement and the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals.
